value.title: Power Apps Branding Screen and Theme
value.excerpt: #PowerApps #PowerAppsPyramid   In this video I show how you can create a branding screen in your Power Apps applications that mimics your company brand standard and use that screen to create a custom re-usable theme.    This is an expansion on my "App Makeover: Quick Tips for Beautiful PowerApps" talk

value.title: PowerApps Draggable Controls
value.excerpt: #PowerApps #HowTo In this video, I show how you can make controls inside your PowerApps draggable.  This method uses a hidden slider control to make it so you can drag a separate object across the screen.  I show a use case of dragging a "Task Card" from a Not Started, In Progress to Complete Buckets.

value.title: PowerApps Common Data Service Option Sets  - Create, Filter, Patch, and More
value.excerpt: In this video, you will learn about Power Apps CDS Option Sets. How to create them with a better default name, how to use them with Filter and Patch, and even how to edit them. value.title: Powerapps on premise data gateway
value.excerpt: In this video, you will learn how to install and configure the PowerApps on premise data gateway. This will allow you to connect to your on prem SharePoint, SQL, and other data sources from PowerApps out in the cloud.   PowerApps Gateway Docs https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powerapps/gateway-reference

value.title: PowerApps String Manipulation
value.excerpt: In this video, you will learn about how to do string manipulation in PowerApps. This core skill helps you when you need to change text that comes from users or data sources to meet your needs. Functions covered include: * Left * Right * Mid * Substitute  * Replace * Find * Len  Check out our upcoming

value.title: 3 Uses for Power Apps Timer Controls
value.excerpt: #PowerApps #Timers  In this video I demo my top 3 use cases for the Timer Control in Power Apps.   You'll learn how to use the timer to: ✅Create animations (rotate objects, move objects across the screen, color fade text) ✅Do automatic redirects  ✅Implement background refreshes for your data sources

value.title: Best way to start Power Apps for a non-professional developer? | One Dev Question: Dona Sarkar

In the One Dev Question series, Principal Cloud Advocate Dona Sarkar shares some tips for getting started and explains why you do not have to be a professional developer to use Power Apps.
